LocationAddress: Great North Road, Kabwata Residential Area
Description: Toyota Corolla stolen from residential compound. Entry through fence. Vehicle reported on ALPR system at checkpoint.
Notes: Vehicle registration: BAZ 4567. Security cameras from neighboring house obtained.

Description: Suspect caught stealing groceries from supermarket. Item value ZMW 850. Security apprehended suspect at exit.
